description: Parses Sobey logistics PDF files (Template 1 and Template 2) to extract shipment data including vendor information, pickup/delivery dates, and line items

capabilities.name: parse_pdf
capabilities.description: Parse a single Sobey PDF file and extract shipment data. Automatically detects Template 1 or Template 2 format and extracts vendor information, dates, cubes, weight, pieces, and other shipment details.

pdf_path.description: Full path to the PDF file to parse (e.g., /path/to/file.pdf)

capabilities.name: parse_directory
capabilities.description: Parse all PDF files in a directory. Processes each PDF file found in the specified directory and returns aggregated results.

directory_path.description: Full path to the directory containing PDF files (e.g., /path/to/pdfs/)

author: RPA Engineer
